long_description: This chamber served as an armory and also an area to store weapons.  There are shields, swords, armor, weapons along the wall.  But wait!  You are being ATTACKED by a suit of armor!  There is a large door on the south end of the room that leads to the End Room.  There is a door on the west side of the room leading to the Barrel Room.
short_description: Room with suit of armor that has come to life, along with doorway that leads to End Room.  There is a doorway(exit) on south end leading to the End Room.  There is a door(exit) on west side leading to the Barrel Room.

Animated Armor.name: Animated Armor
Animated Armor.description: An entire suit of daunting armor with one purpose, eliminate threats to its master.

Door.name: Door
Door.description: This large door has an ominous inscription on it.  It tells the hero that a key is a required item.

Weapons.name: Weapons
Weapons.description: These appear to be broken, rusted weapons; swords, shields, helmets.
